examples.example: 公司的各个部门相互配合，共同推动着业务的良好发展。

translate.english: Each department of the company cooperates with each other to jointly promote the good development of the business.

examples.example: 我们公司的不同部门齐心协力，为实现共同的目标而努力奋斗。

translate.english: The different departments of our company work together in unison and strive hard to achieve the common goal.

examples.example: 我们公司的各个部门紧密合作，创造了出色的业绩。

translate.english: All departments of our company cooperate closely and create excellent achievements.
